segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.

segments.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
segments.en: Now at that time he was sick, suffering, gravely ill.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā mahācundo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Venerable Mahācunda went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side. The Buddha said to him:
“Cunda, express your understanding of the awakening factors.”

segments.pli: “Sattime, bhante, bojjhaṅgā bhagavatā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
segments.en: “Sir, the Buddha has rightly explained these seven awakening factors. When developed and cultivated, they lead to direct knowledge, to awakening, and to extinguishment.

segments.pli: Satisambojjhaṅgo kho, bhante, bhagavatā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati … pe … upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo kho, bhante, bhagavatā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
segments.en: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhante, satta bojjhaṅgā bhagavatā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
segments.en: These are the seven awakening factors that the Buddha has rightly explained. When developed and cultivated, they lead to direct knowledge, to awakening, and to extinguishment.”
Indeed, Cunda, these are awakening factors!”
And that’s how the Buddha recovered from that illness.

segments.pli: Tathāpahīno ca bhagavato so ābādho ahosīti.

sections.title: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha,…

suttaplex.blurb: When the Buddha was sick, Mahācunda taught him the awakening factors, inspiring him to a swift recovery.
